thread.title: Pep Guardiola demands an explanation after Manchester City are denied a penalty for push on Raheem Sterling
thread.title_full: Pep Guardiola demands an explanation after Manchester City are denied a penalty for push on Raheem Sterling

author: sunsportonline
title: Pep Guardiola demands an explanation after Manchester City are denied a penalty for push on Raheem Sterling
text:
'I don't understand' Pep Guardiola demands an explanation after Manchester City are denied a penalty for push on Raheem Sterling 
The Citizens drew 2-2 with Tottenham Hotspur as they dropped more points in the title race, but the Spanish manager believes City should have had a spot-kick after Walker fouled Sterling BY MIKE McGRATH
